mapper.select: SELECT r.id , r.c_id , r.u_id , u.profile , u.nickname , r.content , r.cdate , r.udate FROM linker.c_reply r INNER JOIN linker.user u ON r.u_id = u.id WHERE r.c_id = #{c_id} ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linker.c_reply (c_id, content, u_id) VALUES (#{c_id}, #{content}, #{u_id})
